title: Stuck on reconnect screen
body:
I'm about to launch my computer into a wall I pressed skip waiting for stats and the whole computer to the game is destroyed and I'm asking how do I reconnect and the chat rooms couldn't send me a invite to a game that finished 10 minutes ago also the chat rooms are full of -12 yes minus 12 year olds when it comes to help sometimes .
HELP WHAT DO I DO?!

replies.body: Had the same issue, hasn't appeared in match history and didn't get LP from it.{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
yes and my ranked game is gone  wasted
same, my ranked game disappeared and no lp gained lmao

Exact same here fished a ranked game by winning when it was going to the stats screen it never loaded so i skipped the waiting for stats screen and then i logged out and now i get the reconnect screen and i cant get past it. maybe its a TPG issue i know yesterday they were having issues with TPG customers
I'm with optus and it's happening to me.
I'm having a similar problem - I finished a dynamic queue (5 stack) with friends about 50 minutes ago and whenever I log on it still says "reconnect to game".
have you tried reinstalling the last patch?
OK I got it to work. Issue is gone in aware of everything :D

you have to open in admin and disconnect from your internet 3 times on the reconnect screen, then about 5 or so min of reconnect/wait for program to respond when it crashes fixes it, but it will happen again if you dc in the next game
I clicked repair on the toolbar thing waiting to see what happens

repair does crap all (for me atleast, wasted life), you click it, wait a bajillion years, then problem is still there. This issue you describe, I had the exact same problem on the 7th of december. And what i said above was how i removed it, after ~3 games without dcing once it seems to fix that issue and it wont bother you again.
That repair button wasted my life and the problem is still there.. Look no LoL for Friday night I guess all good I'll come back to it tommorow to much stress atm
told you the repair button is a life wasted
Games completely fucked at the moment
